messages.message:
Hi Team,

do we know why weâ€™ve manually added the following env. params in webapp deployment in prod. These env. params are not present in our env-template.json and has caused an influx of tons of logs to Datadog and GKE logs since 13th December.
Also, directly changing a deployment spec in the prod. (and other critical envs.) should be discouraged as not all changes get wiped out in next deployment as `kubectl apply` works like patch.

```        - name: GRPC_ENABLE_FORK_SUPPORT
          value: "0"
        - name: GRPC_VERBOSITY
          value: error
        - name: GRPC_TRACE
          value: all```
cc: @abhitaker @puneet
For visibility, We started producing ~60-70M logs per day from ~500K after applying this patch.
FYI - removed all 3 env configs and restarted webapp deployment
grpc trace should really only be enabled for debugging I think. that one is super spammy!
